name: Ruby's Adventure (The_K_Lord)
description:
First i want to mentioned that i created this game solely in my after hours after a wife and kid to show off what you can do, even when your extremly busy and sometimes drained.

Obviously this is the Rubys Adventure Unity Tutorial fully stretched out to a Complete game.

 I really loved the tutorial and was kinda sad that you dont have a full game in the end, so I build my sadness out off the way and came out with this.

Also I know that there are some bugs, but i am now about 4 months in it, always working in my late hours after the job and after kid and i am now ready to move on and let this one go.

I hope you have some fun with this cute little game.
